entry.title: About
entry.content:
Welcome to Laxmi's blog.ğŸ¤

Photo by Julia Freeman-Woolpert from FreeImages

About our website

  • This is a bilingual blog written by anonymous authors. It is mainly aimed at readers who can use the Internet in China. It also hopes to provide foreign friends with a channel to understand China.
  • For the convenience of all parties, the content of the English version of the blog post will be slightly different from the Chinese version.

Who's blogger

The bloggers are contributors to all voluntary unpaid contributions. We share a pseudonym: Laxmi.

Contributions welcome

Email: Laxmi_Hyacintha@protonmail.com
